headline: Builders FirstSource Announces Dual Listing on NYSE Texas
summary: IRVING, Texas, August 11, 2025--Builders FirstSource, Inc. (NYSE: BLDR) announced today the dual listing of its common stock on NYSE Texas, the newly launched fully electronic equities exchange headquartered in Dallas, TX. The Company will maintain its primary listing on the New York Stock Exchange and trade with the same "BLDR" ticker symbol on NYSE Texas.
